comment:
* Utilities for mapping between old and new language, country, and other
 * locale ID related names.
 * @hide Only a subset of ICU is exposed in Android

variables.name: _languages
variables.comment:
This list MUST be in sorted order, and MUST contain the two-letter codes
    if one exists otherwise use the three letter code

variables.name: _languages3
variables.comment:
This list MUST contain a three-letter code for every two-letter code in the
    list above, and they MUST ne in the same order (i.e., the same language must
    be in the same place in both lists)!

variables.name: _countries
variables.comment: This list MUST be in sorted order, and MUST contain only two-letter codes!

variables.name: _obsoleteCountries
variables.comment: this table is used for three letter codes

variables.name: _countries3
variables.comment:
This list MUST contain a three-letter code for every two-letter code in
    the above list, and they MUST be listed in the same order!

methods.name: public static String[] getISOCountries()
methods.comment:
* Returns a list of all 2-letter country codes defined in ISO 3166.
     * Can be used to create Locales.

methods.name: public static String[] getISOLanguages()
methods.comment:
* Returns a list of all 2-letter language codes defined in ISO 639
     * plus additional 3-letter codes determined to be useful for locale generation as
     * defined by Unicode CLDR.
     * Can be used to create Locales.
     * [NOTE:  ISO 639 is not a stable standard-- some languages' codes have changed.
     * The list this function returns includes both the new and the old codes for the
     * languages whose codes have changed.]

methods.name: public static String getISO3Country(String country)
methods.comment:
* Returns a three-letter abbreviation for the provided country.  If the provided
     * country is empty, returns the empty string.  Otherwise, returns
     * an uppercase ISO 3166 3-letter country code.
     * @exception MissingResourceException Throws MissingResourceException if the
     * three-letter country abbreviation is not available for this locale.

methods.name: public static String getISO3Language(String language)
methods.comment: * Returns a three-letter abbreviation for the language. If language is * empty, returns the empty string. Otherwise, returns * a lowercase ISO 639-2/T language code. * The ISO 639-2 language codes can be found on-line at * ftp://dkuug.dk/i18n/iso-639-2.txt * @exception MissingResourceException Throws MissingResourceException if the * three-letter language abbreviation is not available for this locale.

methods.name: private static int findIndex(String[] array, String target)
methods.comment:
* linear search of the string array. the arrays are unfortunately ordered by the
     * two-letter target code, not the three-letter search code, which seems backwards.

methodNames: private static int findIndex(String[] array, String target)
